column2: inspecting my new shield design. "Our warriors will no doubt be able to move more swiftly with this, without being at more risk. If only more people undestood the value of that..."
putting down the battle plan I have devised. "With commanders like you leading our warriors, we should be able to outflank and outwit any foe."
having listened to my words. "You will for sure triumph against any foe foolish enough to challenge you in the jungles."

reining in [fellow_member.GetHerHis] horse next to mine. "I think our foes will be taken by surprise when we strike them as rapidly as you suggest, and that will allow us to inflict quite a few casualties."

putting down the new shield I handed [fellow_member.GetHerHim]. "Being able to carry some additional supplies inside the pouches you have added to this will be quite the advantage, especially in winter."
